Articles.Content:
Hello everybody. Finaly, I decided that I ready to start new great space program, with bunch of mods and mission reports. Only question is: should I make a videos for my missions?

So, here I made test video. It is... Well, test. No intro, not best audio... But at least you can hear my voice and say: should I make videos or this will be not the best idea?

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5SyyqLiA8U0&feature=youtu.be

That was not best, I know =_= I should trimm my in-game audio. And maybe, speak a bit louder.

Well, new patch - new space program! Didn't got much opinions about making vids, gonna just post screenshots and reports.

I'm too lasy to count all my mods, so I just post screenshot of my GameData folder here.

Updated mods, crossed fingers, created new save... Let's go! My next post will be actual mission report.

Well, first flight gone surprisingly well!

That very first rocket probably not gonna get too far. I hope I will bring some science from mountines.

I think, I'm loosing it. But I must admit, that was better than I expected!

I don't even...

Now, that was something!
